# Mental health % in india, 2000-2017

https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/osmi/mental-health-in-tech-survey

```{r}
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
data4 <- read_csv("data/Mental health Depression disorder Data.csv") %>% 
  filter(Entity == "India")
```

```{r}
data5 <- data4 %>% 
  filter(Year %in% c(2000: 2019)) %>% 
  head(18) %>% 
  mutate(index=as.character(index))
```

```{r}
str(data5)
```

```{r}
data6 <- data5 %>% 
  group_by(Year) %>% 
mutate(Menatl_illness_percent = sum(across(where(is.numeric))),
       Year=as.numeric(Year)) %>% 
  select(Year, Menatl_illness_percent) 
```

```{r}
str(data6)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data6, aes(x=Year, y= Menatl_illness_percent))+
  geom_line()
```
